children: Algorithm summarizing the American College of Physicians recommendations for the evaluation of patients with hematuria. AMH = asymptomatic microscopic hematuria; UA = urinalysis.

Reprinted with permission from Nielsen M, Qaseem A; High Value Care Task Force of the American College of Physicians. Hematuria as a marker of occult urinary tract cancer: advice for high-value care from the American College of Physicians.
